title: Bloomberg Markets: Lancz on Using Extremes, Taking Profits
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Lancz on Using Extremes, Taking Profits
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Alan B Lancz Director of Research LanczGlobal.com also President of Alan B Lancz & Associates Discussing volatility in the markets and investing in tech and energy. You can learn more at www.LanczGlobal.com. Bloomberg News e.
